original_text: Therefore you are great, O Lord God. For there is none like you, and there is no God besides you, according to all that we have heard with our ears.
korean_text: 그런즉 주 여호와여 이러므로 주는 위대하시니 이는 우리 귀로 들은 대로는 주와 같은 이가 없고 주 외에는 신이 없음이니이다

sentences.original_text: Therefore you are great, O Lord God.
For there is none like you
and there is no God besides you
according to all that we have heard with our ears
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 귀로 들은 모든 것에 따르면,
